column4: Hello all, Is there a list of game that will run on Linux, or any one know if Never Winter Nights will?
can you help me with this? all i want to move is my saved things from my windows install so what all do i need to do? look>http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/36960/
wheres your windows partition mount point? you can just use Nautilus or w/e file manager
ok so all i need to copy over tho is my saves?
ya basically all the stuff the directions sez
so can i just install the normal way of linux then copy over or do i need to use the mounted install to get my saves?
ya just install on Linux then copy over
ATI sucks, runs my C&C Ren at 1 FPS on Wine
whereas my Nvidia does it at 75 FPS
ya it is hard with ati on linux
i reallly hope AMD lives up to their promises
why when i try to run NWN my screen says Analog Out of range?
